title: Watch & Earn doesn't work
body: when the mission first came up i clicked on it in hopes to complete it but when i get to the website it starts to bug out and i cant click on anything it keeps refreshing itself and changing the tab and it isn't slowly either it was constantly non stop any time i would try to click on anything on the site so i gave up and today 7/3 i went back to try again and it was working i could watch Vods and stuff without it going crazy so i click on a Vod in hopes of finishing it and it plays for a bit before redirecting me to the login menu of the league of legends website and signing me out and the redirecting me again back to the Vod i thought it was just a one time thing so i sign back in but everytime i would try to i would get in with my account and it would sign me out again i need help i don't know if this has happened to anyone else or if riot knows about this and is working on a fix

replies.body: Hey there!  Can you guys try again?  There were some odd bugs on the platform that caused this issue for a few.  If you can retry and let me know, that would be awesome!  If it doesn't work, we can look into what's happening.
i have tried again after 29 days and i'm still having the same problem it's still not working
When I log in it immediately logs me out.  I can still watch, just not logged in. {{summoner:12}}
i have solved the problem. the problem was that cookie were disabled i found this out my just messing around with it a bit but once i enabled cookies it worked just fine
i tried many times with cookies and without, same with adblocker. it just doesnt work!
Yeah im having the exact same problem. I cant login and Im not able to do the missions
